thread.title: Leicester City fans serenading an elderly Spanish woman is the strangest thing you'll see in the Champions League
thread.title_full: Leicester City fans serenading an elderly Spanish woman is the strangest thing you'll see in the Champions League

author: Jake Polden
title: Leicester City fans serenading an elderly Spanish woman is the strangest thing you'll see in the Champions League
text:
Sport Leicester City fans serenading an elderly Spanish woman is the strangest thing you'll see in the Champions League The sight of the woman dancing away in the middle of a crowd of excited football fans is just too much Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Leicester fans serenade an elderly Spanish lady in Seville Share this video Get football   Could   
Leicester City are new to this competition. 
They've never played in a knock-out game in the Champions League before, and so as expected, their fans are a little excited. 
But even that cannot explain what on earth is going on in the above video. 
Don't get us wrong it makes for pretty hilarious viewing, it's just not something we would expect to see from the Foxes supporters in Seville. 
In the clip, the Leicester fans can be seen singing and having a drink ahead of the first leg of their last-16 clash with Sevilla. Leicester City fans get in the spirit of things (Photo: @jeevanbasra /Twitter) The elderly woman dances with the Foxes fans (Photo: @jeevanbasra /Twitter) 
That's all well and good and expected. 
But then you notice who is dancing away in the very middle of a large and loud crowd - an elderly Spanish lady. 
And then you notice that the fans are in fact serenading her and having the absolute time of their lives while doing it... and that's when it gets a little hard to explain. We wonder if she made it to the game... (Photo: Leicester City FC/Getty Images) 
Still, we think the party atmosphere is great to see and fair play to both parties for letting their hair down and having a laugh. 
Only in the world of football does this sort of thing happen. poll loading Is this the strangest thing you've ever seen in the Champions League? 0+ VOTES SO FAR Yes! It doesn't get stranger than that No! I once saw a... oh, nevermind Like us on Facebook
